name: Extract Session Info
prompt: Extract the basic session info from this transcript including the session title, date, times, and crew members with their roles. Use skateboarding terminology where appropriate - think of this as a skateboarding IT project team session.
assistant_prompt: Yo! Looking at this session transcript, here's the extracted session info that conforms to the provided schema, presented with some sk8r style, without surrounding ```json ... ``` markers:
